remarks: Triangle inequality for the norm of a vector difference.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvmtri.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvmtri.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
nvmtri.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nvmtri $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A M B ) ) <_ ( ( N ` A ) + ( N ` B ) ) ) $.
